Ina ni Meyah Amatorio, iginiit na walang kinalaman ang anak sa pagkamatay ni Jang Lucero tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-749082 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/749082/ina-ni-meyah-amatorio-iginiit-na-walang-kinalaman-ang-anak-sa-pagkamatay-ni-jang-lucero/story/ Nanindigan ang ina ni Meyah Amatorio na walang kinalaman ang kaniyang anak sa brutal na pagkamatay ng nobya nitong si Jang Lucero. US to help Japan monitor unprecedented Chinese incursion around disputed E.China Sea tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-749073 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/749073/us-to-help-japan-monitor-unprecedented-chinese-incursion-around-disputed-e-china-sea/story/ The US military will help Japan monitor "unprecedented" Chinese incursions around East China Sea islands controlled by Tokyo but claimed by Beijing as Chinese boats prepare to begin fishing in nearby waters, the commander of US Forces Japan said on Wednesday.
